website_summaries.verdict: This keratin-fortified shampoo is good for people experiencing hair loss.
pros: Baebody's shampoo includes other essential oils such as jojoba and coconut
Another bonus – this shampoo isn't tested on animals, and is a safe choice for color-treated hair
cons: Its scent may be too perfume-y for some

customer_reviews.title: Watered down drastically
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product once and it was great! The second time I bought it, it had a water consistency and couldn’t even stay in my hand when I was pumping it out. It was soapy but I feel like they probably are taking some out and watering it down which is messed up. Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: ARG58

customer_reviews.title: Watery
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo smells good and can be unisex is the only positive I have for this product. It is VERY watery and you have to use a lot of shampoo to wash your hair. (Water is also listed as the first ingredient.) I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gee

customer_reviews.title: First use made a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I got my order early. I used it 2 days ago and it smelled so lovely. I barely had to comb through my hair with the conditioner in. I have dry, curly, frizz ball hair and one use made my hair super soft and better defined curl. Gave it 4 stars since ive only used it once. Give it a try I say
customer_reviews.author: Daniela piedra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. I have been using it for a couple years now. The conditioner is new for me and it is just as great as the shampoo. My scalp breaks out very easily but I do not break out with this shampoo. Plus it smells really good. I’m glad I took a chance and purchased this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: B.Brad

customer_reviews.title: Watery!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is so watery that I literally have to pump directly to the area I want to lather. At this rate, I'll be out it in less than 2 months! I've never complained on an order before, but this one deserves no more than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Wendywag

customer_reviews.title: It's thin and doesn't provide good results. It's much like my hand soap
customer_reviews.text: Is this really Argon shampoo? I don't feel it or smell it in this product. It's thin and doesn't provide good results. It's much like my hand soap, but not like any Argan oil shampoo I've previously used. Not something I would ever recommend. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: TrueIronFan

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair feeling heavy
customer_reviews.text: There is a definite feeling of heavy residue left on my hair after I use the shampoo and conditioner. I tried just using the shampoo and that doesn’t seem to solve the problem. My 15-year old daughter agrees. She has very long and silky hair. After using these products her hair looks like it needs to be washed again shortly after blow drying. I gave 2 stars because the smell is nice and the bottles are classy. That’s about all the good I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The Equivalent of Washing My Hair with Water
customer_reviews.text: This product was not what I was expecting, considering how high of a customer rating it received. As per other recent 1 star reviews that I've read about this product, I completely agree that this shampoo was extremely watered down to the point where you can't even cup it in your hand. I'm going to assume that the supplier recently started watering down their product to ration their supply. Please, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad for my hair and scalp
customer_reviews.text: Seemed fine at first but now, after about a week of using this product, I realized that my scalp and hair became very dry. My scalp was a bit itchy and it caused some light dandruff. I switched back to my regular shampoo and conditioner and my hair is back to normal so I will no longer use this product. Also it's a pricey compared to my regular shampoo. It just doesn't work for me but it might be ok for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Really good and also cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a broke college student, but I also have fine hair that's fairly prone to drying/tangling. This set is well within my budget, lasts me a long time because of the pump dispenser, and is really nice on my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hairstylist recommended!
customer_reviews.text: ****update*** I just opened my second bottle and the shampoo is water thin! I think they may have made a bad batch because my first bottle was a completely different texture.***update*** My hairstylist recommended this shampoo to me after I got my hair colored for the first time. It makes my hair so soft and it smells amazing! Would highly recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this new conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. I'm so glad that Baebody now makes argon oil conditioner. I have fine hair and most conditioners leave my hair flat, heavy, and oily feeling but Baebody conditioner rinses clean and leaves my hair soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and conditioner for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I received a coupon for $2 off this set and was excited to try it. I have very dry skin and it's hard to find a gentle shampoo and conditioner that still leaves my hair feeling clean rather than weighed down with waxy conditioner. I loved this! My hair is so soft, clean, and it even removed some of the buildup on my scalp without leaving me dry and itchy
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: This is the consistency of WATER and doesn’t even clean my hair GROSS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Kelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This time it was thick.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this, and am much happier than the first time. The first time, as many others have said, it was nearly as thin as water. However, it still did a great job of making my hair soft and and manageable so I thought I'd give it another chance. This bottle had a seal on it, and was much thicker as you would expect shampoo to be. I've only washed my hair once with the new and will update my review when I get more experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase - ALL WATERED DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these before along with the matching conditioner. I was happy with it. Bought another bottle shampoo but this time it was watered down. The first bottle was consistency of a hand cream. The second bottle has consistency of watered down skim milk, and it takes twice as much to get a lather going. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don Quixote

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shampoo and conditioner!! Leaves my hair clean and soft and settles down my split ends. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: BigClipper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any type of hair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any type of hair. Leaves your hair soft fresh and easy to style. Would definitely purchase again and recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Roush

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First bottle (pictures on the right) was a rich, nicely scented shampoo. I reordered a bottle for our second shower and it was watery, forcing you to use much more. There was very little scent. I thought it might just be a poor quality control issue. I ordered a 3rd bottle - expensive mistake; it was also watery with very little fragrance. I am done with this product.
customer_reviews.author: John J. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Finally... a true wash and go!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the product. With 3 different females in our household and 3 different types of hair, we usually have at least 6 different products lined up in the shower. After I bought this, it has become our first shared product. I love how my hair looks and feels. I wash and go now. No hair dryers, straighteners and/or smoothing cream. Literally wash and go...
customer_reviews.author: Natella

customer_reviews.title: I thought Argan Oil Shampoo was just another 2017 beauty ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought Argan Oil Shampoo was just another 2017 beauty hype but after a couple uses, I gotta say otherwise. My hair is less frizzier than before and seems to be growing a bit faster than how it's been for the last year or so. The only complaint I have is that the shampoo is a bit watery which makes it a bit difficult for me to transfer to my hair once pumped into my hand, but I can live with it if the results make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: JulieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I was using artnaturals argon shampoo prior to using this and I can feel a huge difference. Artnaturals feels really dry and this product feels awesome. I really love the ingredients of the shampoo because there are only a few in the list and all of them seems really safe :) not too sure abt the conditional though, they have ingredients that are not in layman’s terms. Anyways love the shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair feeling clean and moisturized.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the first that I’ve used that leaves my hair feeling clean, without stripping its natural oils, and without making it feel like a creamy mess, like shampoos with moisturizers and conditioners built in. Once every few days to a week I’ll condition it as well, and the conditioner rinses out really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sandruck

customer_reviews.title: Organic, lathers well, & improves hair texture
customer_reviews.text: Love Baebody’s Argan oil shampoo, especially because it comes WITHOUT the conditioner. It smells great, lathers well, and leaves my long hair smooth and silky. Ever since going organic with haircare, I’ve tried several brands that left my hair in “jungle” condition until I discovered Argan oil shampoos. That said, I was originally using Majestic Pure’s Argan oil shampoo/conditioner set, but over time there was too many bottles of leftover conditioner because of how much more saturated it is than the shampoo. Now using Baebody’s shampoo paired with Majestic Pure’s leftover conditioner. Glad that they work well together but Baebody’s pretty pricey compared to Majestic Pure.
customer_reviews.author: jL

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in December and didn't open it until we reached our destination in Arizona that we stay at for several weeks. Imagine my surprise when I went to put the shampoo in my hands and it ran out like water. We were home when this came, so know it didn't set out on our porch in the cold. I have been using it and if my hair is really wet and I pour a little more than usual on my head, I can get it to lather up, so I am going to finish it up, but will not order it again. I much prefer the Sulfate free Argan Oil Shampoo from Morocco and will buy that again.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The shampoo is gentle, smells great, a little can go a long way! The conditioner is very mild, doesn't weigh the hair down, though it doesn't have much of a scent. I feel like my scalp is less dry and my hair is healthier and shinier with more volume since using this for about 3 weeks. I'm also noticing I don't have to shampoo as often because my oil production is stabilizing. It's awesome that this comes with a variety of lids soyou can choose what you like.
customer_reviews.author: JMurillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the shampoo and conditioner. I have thick shoulder length hair that is colored and dry. I used both and the first time I used it I blow dryed hair and it turned out soft and shiny. Hair does not feel like there’s too much product on it. Is soft and was impressed because I usually have to also use a leave in conditioner to get the tangles out. Did not have to use it at all. My scalp feels good. I would recommend this product and I have tried many different types of Shampoo and conditioners. This one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Laura woods

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My hair does not shine or look clean. It takes a lot to get enough shampoo to clean my hair around my face, ears and neck
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is healthy for my hair and makes it look fuller
customer_reviews.text: I am 71 years old and have relatively long hair. In general, my hair is on the thick side, but it had some damage from heat curling. Since the shampoo contains a lot of oils, I was hesitant to use it on my hair because it tends to be oily. For my hair, it takes 3 squirts to get enough for a shampoo, and it did not at all add to the oiliness of my hair. I have noticed that I lose less hair to my brush and my hair looks fuller. I will continue to use this shampoo since it is made from natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: update after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My dry hair is softer and has more life after just a few days of use. Fly-away dryness is gone. Good stuff. No fragrance at all (nice). Update after 2 months: shampoo has turned to watery milky consistency. Hard to use (runs out of hand) —just feels cheap and watery now. I’ll try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: ... on Amazon Prime day since the price was so good and I'm SO glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon Prime day since the price was so good and I'm SO glad I did. It smells great and leaves my VERY curly VERY frizzy hair feeling soft and healthy. Bought the conditioner too and love that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than extected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo/conditioner based on several online reviews. Lately everyone has been complimenting me one how well my hair looks. For an older guy with super thin lifeless hair, I now have quite a bit of body restored.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have fine, shoulder-length
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, shoulder-length, textured hair that I color regularly. I have tried many many different moisturizing shampoos and they have either not moisturized or have left my hair feeling limp, oily, or gross. I tried this one after reading the reviews and I'm glad I did. This stuff is wonderful! It took about a week to see the difference but my hair is softer, shiny, and it has more body. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Product consistency is variable
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this a number of times from Amazon. Twice I have received a watered down version. Usually it is a creamy consistency and a great product. The first time this happened, I thought it was a random problem but this last time was the second time it was so watery that I couldn't hold it in my hand without seeping through my fingers. I had to pump it directly on my head. When the quality is good, it's a great product but the company needs to work on quality control.
customer_reviews.author: ESAS

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing for straight, fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner is exactly what I was looking for! I have very fine hair that I bleached for the first time, and honestly didn't do the research I should have on bleaching. My hair was so dry it was crunchy. These saved my hair! They not only brought the moisture back, but my hair is actually softer than it was. As an added bonus, they send you both a regular squeeze cap or a pump, so you can pick which one works best for you. A little also seems to go a long way with these, so each bottle has been lasting me quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amietti

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what happened?!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this shampoo and conditioner regularly; however, this will probably be the last time I purchase it. This time the shampoo is like pure water and runny. I do not know what happened with this shampoo but it barely washes my hair. I liked it beforehand and was going to continue to order but I need something that actually washes my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and manageable hair 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new shampoo and conditioner set to replace the salon set I was using. My hair felt frizzy and unmanageable. After reading the reviews, I was hesitant, but hopeful because of the natural ingredients. Boy, am I glad I took the chance in this set! My hair is sooo soft and sleek! After one use! The bottle says it is gentle enough to use daily but I prefer not to do so and use it every other day like I have always done. My hair does get oily in the second day, but it’s always been that way. I just use dry shampoo in between washes. So glad I got this set!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this shampoo the first time I bought it. The second time I bought it the shampoo literally seemed like it had been watered down...A LOT. I am not suggesting that it actually was, especially as it appears, upon reading other comments, that others also received it this way. I might try it again because I loved it so much the first time, when it was thicker. It is still great but takes like 5-6 spritzes into the hand vs 1-2 of the previous bottle. If the next one is watery I'll move on to another product. Seller was great though.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi W. Scantlebury

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo I've found in ages!!!!  Would love a conditioner, too.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for months for a moisturizing shampoo to soothe my dry, course hair. This one did it and I could tell as soon as I lathered up! I had asked my hairdresser for products to address my problem. Ended up spending a small fortune for products that made no difference at all. I feel like I got lucky with this purchase. I'd love to order a conditioner if and when it might be available. Thank you so much for your wonderful shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: cathie murillo

customer_reviews.title: Soft & silky
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shampoo! I've purchased it multiple times & will continue to do so. My scalp is very sensitive to shampoos & this is the only one I've found that doesn't cause my scalp to break out or become itchy (besides using a dandruff shampoo). I also don't have to use conditioner with it either and it leaves my hair silky & soft. The pump is super convenient, too. Also comes with a flip cap if you prefer that style over the pump. Bottle lasts a long time because it doesn't take much to wash your hair. I have medium length hair & it usually lasts me at least 2+ months.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Indifferent
customer_reviews.text: I cannot remember why I bought this product (I think it was a positive review I read somewhere), but it is disappointing. While it may be good for my hair, it seems to be no better or worse than most other shampoos I have tried. But two things stand out: it has no smell at all (and part of shampooing, for me, is getting a great shampoo smell), and the pump produces so little product that you have to mump it multiple times in order to get enough to do the job. In short, not much here to make me buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: great for dry hair or scalp!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have dried out hair and scalp, and i was advised to go natural and avoid sulfate products. This argan oil shampoo was exactly what i was looking for and it really helped with my scalp and the health of my hair. Will keep using this product in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Henry C

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the hopes of bringing control to my frizzy hair. Unfortunately, after using the shampoo and conditioner for 2 weeks my hair is actually worse than when I started. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IrateGerbil

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: Finally a natural shampoo that doesn't leave my hair feeling greasy. This is my go to brand. You only need a little bit. With all natural shampoo- use a small amount to scrub your scalp, rinse, then use a small amount all over and rinse. I love the pump too.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Described
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my short, straight, color treated hair. Product not watered down as some have said, but thick and creamy. My dry color treated hair had shine after one use. I purchased another bottle from the actual web site for Baebody to see if there is a difference in consistency. I am very pleased with this product. P.S. been using for a month and it may be my imagination but my hair is thicker. I did purchase a 2nd bottle from the actual manufacturer and the consistency, color, and quality are an exact match, very thick and creamy.
customer_reviews.author: acferran

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shampoo for the first time over a year ago and it was awesome! The shampoo smelled great, it had a good consistency, and did wonders for my hair. When I ran out I obviously wanted to order move, however, I’m not sure if the formula changed or someone made a mistake. The shampoo I recently received has a very watery consistency unlike the bottle I ordered before. It’s so watered down that it literally runs through your hand when pumped. Product control must have slipped or something. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tks516

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo/conditioner combination I have tried yet.
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly/wavy hair. This product works great! I have nice, soft curls and full volume. I tried another product that promised thicker hair but I didn't notice any difference and didn't like the feel of my hair as much as I do with this. I also hated the smell. The shampoo and conditioner from Baebody both smell great! I am a repeat purchaser for this product.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraHN

customer_reviews.title: Great product, doesn't weigh down my hair
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to purchase a product that did not weigh my hair down after months of use. I have used this product for 2+ months and it works. It does not weigh down my hair. Leave my hair shinny and smooth. The reason why I didn't give it 5 stars was because of the smell. I'm used to fruity scents in shampoo and conditioner and this product does not have that. If you're looking for a long term product that won't weigh down your hair and you can go 2-3 days without washing, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Mmperry

customer_reviews.title: Beware where you purchase this
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I found it to be extremely watery. I contacted the company and was told it should be thick and creamy. They were great and I got my replacement today. What a difference. Looking forward to trying the "real" product. I would recommend buying this straight from the company. The shampoo, even watery, did a nice job on my hair and I love the shine.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo but not so moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good shampoo. After using Keune Color Care Shampoo, this honestly feels kind of drying on my fine, thick head of hair. Don't get me wrong, my hair feels soft, but it is more difficult to detangle and defrizz even along with the Keune conditioner. It does help provide a little volume though. It has a pleasant smell like most shampoos do. I cannot get the dispenser pump to open for some reason so I just dump it in my hand and use the cap provided.
customer_reviews.author: NotAWitchProbably

customer_reviews.title: Love! Got rid of dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shampoo and conditioner. No matter what I did or used I always had had a dry scalp. I’ve been using this for well over six months and it cleared but my dry scalp with the first use. It leaves my hair feeling just as good, if not better, than a well known brand of “regular” shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair dull
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the shampoo smells. Conditioner had no scent at all which I thought odd. Shampoo lathered well. Hair felt dry and dull. (shoulder length, fine, mildly curly) and did nothing for the winter -dry air frizz I sometimes get. Gave to my daughter and she felt conditioner would not rinse out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic products!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!!! My hair is the healthiest it had ever been in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Product now the consistency of water - same with replacement bottle - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth or fifth bottle and the contents are the consistency of water, very much unlike the previous bottles. Returned the last one and reordered but the replacement was just as bad. Wouldn't lather. Can't even get it from your hand to your hair before it runs out on the floor. Assumed this is a manufacturing defect or serious quality control problem but the problem continues. Returned a second time for refund. Will not reorder. Suggest you find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: BillV

customer_reviews.title: I have really baby fine hair and I always need a shampoo that adds ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really baby fine hair and I always need a shampoo that adds volume!! When I received it I was disappointed that no where on the bottle did it say that it would add volume!!! I gave it a try and all I can say is not only did it add volume but my hair was so shiny and soft!!! I also loved the smell and I loved how it lathered with just a small amount!!! Hopefully I will continue to see my hair look healthier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Moisturizing and Very Meh
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a disappointment for being moisturizing in any way. Smells nice, but is of cheapo quality--just regular old basic budget shampoo trying to seem fancy. Also VERY runny. I hold the whole bottle up to my head to apply so that it doesn't run right through my fingers! It's functional enough shampoo, but I'd never guess it's supposed to moisturize. I look forward to running out of it so that I can try something else.
customer_reviews.author: E A

customer_reviews.title: WATER IS THICKER THAN THIS SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in the past and it was a nice, thick shampoo. This last bottle that I ordered is like dispensing water; it literally runs out of my hand and down my arm when I try to dispense it and it runs between my fingers before I can even get it to my head. I won't be purchasing again. Great job cutting costs, Baebody!
customer_reviews.author: jedwards

customer_reviews.title: Has formula changed?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before and absolutely loved it. This time, when I ordered it, what I received was a watered down version of the product. The packaging was fine and didn't look tampered with but it was like water when I went to wash my hair. Very disappointed. I wrote the company but never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: EileenJ

customer_reviews.title: Only wish...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love how it cleans my scalp and love the smell. It’s not overwhelming. It really doesn’t leave ur hair frizzy at all. I can go all day without combing my hair. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is I don’t like the consistency of the shampoo. It’s liquidity and u end up using more than u should for lathering. One pump doesn’t give my long hair a lather or wash at all. (Lol u can hear my nephews screaming in the background of my video, walls are thin 😉)
customer_reviews.author: So jiana

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for for about 3 weeks now and I like it so far. Lathers so well which was a pleasant surprise for a sulfate free shampoo. The scent is subtle and pleasant and I like that it has tee tree oil because that ingredient is know to help with dandruff. Overall, I recommend this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: dnfz786

customer_reviews.title: Finally a light at the end of the tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! It last forever, and my hair feels healthier than it has in YEARS! I’ve tried so many shampoos and conditioners lately, I’ll be continuing to use this product! I had horribly damaged hair from bleaching and stripping the color. I finally see a light at the end of the tunnel for healthy hair!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The worst shampoo and creme rice i'ce used. Did not smell good at all nor did it work well for detangling my hair. Awful!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! Made my hair silky smooth, looks and feels very healthy now and smells amazing. It doesn’t make your hair get heavy because of all natural ingredients. I feel like I am living in a shampoo commercial now! I strongly recommend it to people who are tired of wasting money trying to find a nice shampoo...The other bonus is you will see a substantial increase in the amount of hair you have. I was very impressed with it so I told by bf to stop using hair growing products and just use my shampoo :) And one bottle goes a long time and you don't just save from shampoo costs but also from hair salon trips
customer_reviews.author: hg

customer_reviews.title: The bottle of conditioner was broken.... :(
customer_reviews.text: The bottle of conditioner was broken and the conditioner spilled over inside the wrapping bag....
customer_reviews.author: Christian S.

customer_reviews.title: Scalp irritation starts returning whenever i switch to this.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive scalp and it breaks out if I use anything with chemicals. I tried this brand and every time I do, my skin gets irritated. I stop using it and use my other organic shampoo, and everything goes away. What's in it? I don't trust it. It smells good though.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious shampoo at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty apprehensive to try this product due to having fine hair. However I read many reviews and they almost seemed too good to be true that I had to see for myself. The smell of the shampoo is aright but a little overwhelming! It lathers well and washes out easily. My hair seemed to be softer and frizz was less noticeable after just one use. This product didn't seem to make my hair heavy or greasy which is usually the case with my fine hair. I will continue to use and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FD Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Art Naturals Argan Oil Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Art Naturals Argan Oil Shampoo but wanted to switch it up so my hair doesn't get used to the formula. I usually have flaking around the hairline if I use a shampoo that doesn't agree with my body chemistry but this has been a great alternative. I haven't experienced any flaking and though it doesn't make my hair feel any softer it feels clean after using. Highly recommend for those looking for a new shampoo to use on their off months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off??!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the product for the last year and now all of a sudden the same product in the same bottle and sold by the same manufacturer smells totally different and has a totally different consistency. I feel like maybe someone is buying the empty bottles and refilling them with cheap shampoo and selling a knock-off but the manufacturer has not changed. This is very concerning!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Yegiaian

customer_reviews.title: Great for over processed hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shampoos I’ve ever used with my color treated hair. I changed to a different stylist who made my hair too blonde, I bought this after reading reviews and I am so happy I did. This helped make my hair not feel dry and I will use it even after my over processed locks grow out. It is a little expensive but well worth it, I highly recommend to anyone who wants softer hair.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing for you

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is garbage. I only gave it one star because zero isn’t an option. The shampoo has the consistency of water and barely produces a lather. I’ve resorted to pumping shampoo from the bottle directly onto my head because it won’t stay in my hand. The conditioner is only slightly better. The worst Amazon thing I’ve ever bough!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: What is this?
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure how this product received great reviews, this is completely watered down. It's basically if there was leftover shampoo and placed nothing but water in the bottle, shook it up and made the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, hate their choice for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this product which is shampoo and conditioner. However it is shipped in plastic and a paper shipping envelop. This is the third time I have gotten a broken bottle in a shipment. The vendor is very responsive and has replaced the product.
customer_reviews.author: PorBoy

customer_reviews.title: MOISTURIZING WASH!
customer_reviews.text: A bit runny, which you may not be used to, but does not indicate it is a bad product! Makes my hair a bit more moisturized than other generic shampoos. There's also a small amount of ingredients which is nice to see. Only been using it for a few days, but that's my input on it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ni N

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the search for a shampoo that doesn’t weigh my hair down and leaves it clean. I was really excited to try this product after reading the reviews, but I was underwhelmed. Like other reviewers mentioned, I received a VERY thin product that seemed like it was watered down. I have thick hair and it took several pumps to get enough to make my hair feel clean. Not to mention I felt like some was sliding out of my hands and being wasted when I tried to get it on my hair. I will gladly try again if the consistency changes, but for now they have lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is very diluted as compared to before.
customer_reviews.text: The initial order of the shampoo and conditioner was great. But second time around the shampoo was very diluted as if someone added water. Also the conditioner was chalky and had a different smell. Probably not going to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: savvyconsumer

customer_reviews.title: It almost seemed like it had been watered down
customer_reviews.text: Was very liquidy. I always but organ oil shampoo, but this seemed off. It almost seemed like it had been watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: won't rinse out of your hair
customer_reviews.text: I am usually very good at getting the shampoo and conditioner out of my hair. This is so thick, that it is impossible to get out. I built up a soap scum on my scalp and developed a horrible itchy scalp. It was so bad that it broke the skin. I probably could have gotten it out if I had used a vinegar rinse. Instead I threw it out and bought a different shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love that Baebody shampoo is all natural. It leaves my shoulder-length and thick hair soft and manageable without conditioner ( I do need conditioner when my hair is longer). The shampoo does not produce much lather, but this doesn't affect performance and is likely due to the simple, all natural formulation, which I'd what I was looking for when I switched to this shampoo. My most recent bottle is watery compared to the first two bottles I ordered, so I'm not sure if maybe they changed the formulation. I did like the thicker consistency better. The thicker shampoo I would have scored 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mama

customer_reviews.title: From bald to hairy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking and looking for something to smooth and moisturize my hair because I have curly, frizzy, dry hair. After reading the reviews and seeing how cheap this shampoo was I decided to purchase it and I am so happy I did. It hasn't helped my hair and to me it smells like dog shampoo but it made my husband's hair grow back from where it was bald. I'm in such shock! His hair is growing back! I still can't believe it. I'll definitely be buying more when ours runs out.
customer_reviews.author: AdriannaB

customer_reviews.title: Shapoo is WATERY
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shampoo multiple times and just the very first time I found it with real shampoo like consistency. Every other time it just feels like colored water. I kept returning and asking Amazon to send me a authentic/non-fake/non-defective time but every time I again got a fake watery product.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Nasar Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: WORST SHAMPOO EVER ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Worst shampoo ever. Viscosity like water. Runs right out of your hand, must pump directly on to head. The positive reviews must be written by a troll farm. *** YOU'VE BEEN WARNED ! ! ! ***
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has a different texture and aroma then anything I have ever used. Leaves hair the softest as well. You only need to use a very small amount so it lasts longer. I was impressed enough to order two additional bottles to send to friends who are equally impressed. If you have not tried this shampoo yet give it a try, there is no downside.
customer_reviews.author: john clifton

customer_reviews.title: Can I give it 0stars! Completely watered down would ...
customer_reviews.text: Can I give it 0stars! Completely watered down would not stay a second in my hand! Very soapy you can tell from all the bubbles it was watered down
customer_reviews.author: katrin boctor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you've received a watered down version, i'd definitely recommend contacting the company through their website. It definitely shouldn't be runny. I received a watery one from here and emailed them to confirm the consistency and they were able to send me a replacement! The replacement is a great shampoo. It's sulfate free so it does take a little bit more product to distribute throughout long hair. However the smell is amazing and it makes my hair so soft and clean. I love that it comes with the option to use a pump or squeeze it out like other shampoos. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does clean your hair. It does no volumize your hair. Destroys your hair. Leaves hair and scalp very dry and itchy. Has an awkward smell, but luckily only lasts for about 30 minutes. I would not buy this product again. It does not come with a pump as shown in the picture. You have to go out and buy your own pump. It is just about the worse shampoo I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Great sulfate free product!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair that tends to dry out and get split ends. After years of using products with sulfates etc. I decided to switch to Baebody, and my hair is so much happier! It did take a few weeks for my hair to stop being oily, which is normal when you switch from a sufate to non-sulfate shampoo. But once the oilyness subsided, I no longer had the same dry hair, split ends problems. My hair also feels thicker. I've been using this product for about 4 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Not Baebody
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo a year ago and it had a thick pearly texture and was amazing.So good I purchased 2nd time and when I went to put some in my hand it was SO WATERY half the bottle came pouring out. What a waste and I am sick and tired of Amazon allowing knock off and defective products to be sold! This is clearly NOT the true Baebody shampoo. Will purchase it again just elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lori kalage

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is watered down
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I have purchased this shampoo and conditioner. In my most recent purchase, I can easily tell that the shampoo has been watered down and has a VERY STRONG scent. This does not seem like the original product I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this shampoo brand 6 different times on Amazon. Recently, I received a bottle that smelled like motor oil, which I returned. This bottle came and is water down so much it doesn’t clean my hair properly. Time to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Waterbug

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Water
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shampoo for the last 4-5 months and it was great. Ordered for another bottle and feels like someone has diluted it with water and packaged it. It doesn't wash well and I feel that the hair is still greasy after the wash. Don't recommend it and never going to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Last purchase was watery
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered and used this product several times .. have been very satisfied with a thick & rich shampoo. This last time however, it was/is extremely watery -- even after shaking vigorously. Like someone left the cap off while showering & water got into the bottle. It still performs well but kind of hard to hold shampoo in hand . It's the only thing keeping me from giving it a full 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this hair product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this hair product. It’s watered down and takes several pumps to get a good lather. I’ve blown through this bottle in no time. I used it on my daughter’s hair and it looked greasy and stringy so I had to wash it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: BLW

customer_reviews.title: Whats an 80YO to do.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking around AMAZON when I came across Baebody Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo. I had just recently heard about Argan oil and thought I would give it a try. It does a real nice job on my 80 YO blond hair. I don't use anything on my hair except the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Puscheck

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for a month now. I like the smell of it, and have actually used it with my face brush as well. The only positive extra thing I've noticed is that I can go 3 days between washes instead of the two I've been doing for a few years, without my hair or head feeling dirty.
customer_reviews.author: HappyChickenLady

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE - stay away from this product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the shampoo to be thick but when I got it - it was very watery. I thought maybe you had to shake up the bottle before use but even then - the shampoo was still watery. I used it twice and gave up. The shampoo was so watery it was like washing my hair with water and tiny amount of shampoo mixture.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: So far I am LOVING this shampoo! It smells SO good and leaves my hair (thick, frizzy and curly) frizz free and oh so soft! I also got the conditioner! I won't be using anything else every again! Mine wasn't watery like the other reviews so I'm wondering if they got a bad batch or not! Love love LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY DILUTED! More like what you'd expect from the Dollar store!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the 1-3 star reviews. This shampoo is so watery and takes so much to work into my fine, thin hair it's ridiculous. It's won't be long before it's gone and I won't be reordering it. I thought it had something to do with the sulphates. No noticable difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: calgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for a safe alternative to regular shampoos
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this shampoo for several months now; I like that it’s safer choice than the traditional shampoos I used to use. I color my hair and have not had any problem with this stripping my color. I have fine hair and it gets oily quickly but this shampoo washes it well and leaves it feeling nourished.
customer_reviews.author: Heathm

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels soft, smells wonderful and doesn't feel stripped. The shampoo had a great lather while the conditioner doesn't seem to weigh my hair down. Time will tell if it repairs hair, but as of now I'm loving this product especially since it's half the price of regular Moroccan Oil!
customer_reviews.author: Riverflats

customer_reviews.title: A fake
customer_reviews.text: The liquid is diluted to about the same viscosity as milk. The only effect it has on my hair - it makes it so fizzy, it's impossible to brush afterwards. Worse quality than $99 cents store. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: AL

product_meta.title: Baebody Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner with Keratin, 16 Ounces
feature_bullets: ARGAN OIL CONDITIONER: Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner helps to strengthen the hair shaft, restore moisture & smooth strands while providing protection from styling, shedding & environmental factors.
RESTORE SHINE & SOFTNESS: This blend of Moroccan Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Coconut Oil helps restore shine & softness. Great for color treated, fine & curly hair.

BAEBODY BEAUTY INNOVATION: Across our line of hair & skincare products, we aim to help you look & feel fabulous with innovative natural ingredients like hyaluronic acid, retinol, argan oil, activated charcoal & tea tree oil.
YOUR HEALTH COMES FIRST TO US: Because your hair, skin & body health comes Before Anyone Else, our natural, safe & effective beauty products are cruelty-free, paraben-free & safe for most skin types.
MEET BAEBODY BEAUTY: We're obsessed with promoting an active, healthy & balanced lifestyle. We offer a versatile line of cleansers, moisturizers, serums, hair care, carrier oils, body scrubs & more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
